Address.value: 1100 W. TOWN AND COUNTRY ROAD SUITE 1600, ORANGE, California, 92868, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Alignment Healthcare Inc is a next-generation, consumer-centric platform that is revolutionizing the healthcare experience for seniors through Medicare Advantage plans. These plans are marketed and sold direct-to-consumer, allowing seniors to select the manner in which they receive healthcare coverage and services on an annual basis.
